licence_overview: In Northern Ireland, to operate a vehicle that carries more than eight people, for business purposes, you need a road service licence from [Driver and Vehicle Licensing Northern Ireland.](http://www.dvlni.gov.uk/dvlni.aspx "Driver and Vehicle Licensing Northern Ireland"){:rel="external"}
licence_short_description: Road service licence to operate a vehicle that carries more than 8 people in Northern Ireland.
overview: To drive a vehicle with more than 8 people, you need a road service licence from the Driver and Vehicle Agency in Northern Ireland
title: National road service licence (Northern Ireland)
will_continue_on: Driver and Vehicle Agency Northern Ireland
